I recently purchased a pair of Puma white sneakers, and I am thoroughly impressed. The design is sleek and modern, making them versatile enough to pair with both casual and semi-formal outfits. The comfort level is outstanding, with cushioning that supports my feet even during long walks. The build quality is also notable; they feel durable and well-made, which is essential for everyday wear. Additionally, they are easy to clean, maintaining their fresh look effortlessly. Overall, these Puma white sneakers are a fantastic addition to anyone's wardrobe, combining style, comfort, and durability.

comments.comment:
From the moment I slipped these sneakers on, I was impressed by how comfortable they felt. The cushioned insole provides excellent support, making them ideal for long days on my feet.
 These sneakers strike the perfect balance between casual and stylish. The black canvas upper gives them a sleek and versatile look that pairs well with a variety of outfits, from jeans to shorts.
Durability: Despite their lightweight feel, these sneakers are built to last. The sturdy construction and quality materials give me confidence that they'll withstand regular wear and tear.
 Whether I'm running errands around town or meeting up with friends for a casual outing, these sneakers are the perfect choice. They offer the right mix of style and functionality for any occasion.
Overall, I highly recommend the US Polo Assn Men Black Canvas Sneakers to anyone in search of comfortable, stylish footwear. They're a great addition to any wardrobe and offer unbeatable value for the price.

Comfortable: 
The shoe is extremely comfortable to wear, with soft cushioning and a supportive insole.
Stylish: 
The design is sleek and stylish, perfect for both casual and dressy occasions.
Durable: 
The shoe is well-made, with high-quality materials and sturdy construction.
Versatile: 
Can be worn with jeans, trousers

*Cons:
- lNot ideal for heavy use: While the shoe is comfortable, it may not be suitable for heavy use or intense activities.

Overall:
I'm extremely happy with my purchase! The shoe is perfect for everyday wear, and I've received numerous compliments on its stylish design. I would highly recommend this shoe to anyone looking for a comfortable and fashionable addition to their wardrobe.

Recommendation:
If you're looking for a reliable and stylish shoe, I would definitely recommend giving this one a try. Just be aware of the sizing issues and consider ordering a half-size up. Happy shopping on Myntra!

Quality of shoes is good at this price , its canvas material hard to clean , u can wear these shoes at occasions only, these are not for daily use ,go for synthetic leather shoes for daily use. I ordered size uk 7 and it's comfortable to me in other brands i use uk 8 size , i will recommend that buy smaller size by 1 unit .. overall shoes are good not that much wow product but basically at this price and u.s polo it's worth... packaging was poor anyways at myantra it was good deal..😀

If you are looking for shoe without opening the laces regularly then you should not go for it .  I personally am a huge fan of US POLO . But let me explain even  after giving 5 out of 5 why I am not so much fond of this product .  

The most important role of a pair shoes is to provide comfort .  This particular pair of shoes fails in that department slightly . We are not genetically manufactured to have exact 6 or 7 . So if being 6.5 , I am not entitled to have  a pair of comfortable shoes , then entire blame goes to the design .      

Otherwise US Polo is as good as anyone would expect .

I got this shoe very recently during the last sale. The fit is nice and so is the colour scheme. The shoe is extremely sleek. The only drawback about this shoe is it seems to be leather kind of material(don't exactly know what it's called) in the pictures posted here but it is actually converse. And since it's a white shoe, it is very difficult to clean it in case it gets mud on it(unfortunately wore it on a day when it rained) since it also comes with a warning that you're not supposed to wash it. Hope this is helpful for y'all!

Very good quality shoes with classy looks. The material is kinda like cloth fabric. The sole isn't thick, which makes it classy. But it will get dirty quite easily, and getting the right size was quite challenging for me as the difference between Size 8 and size 9 was a bit high ( about 1.7 cm). According to my foot (28 cm) , something between size 8 and 9 would have fitted me perfectly. Size 9 was a bit loose for me, and size 8 fits me a bit loose . After a few hours of usage, it hurts my foot. Getting the right size would make it a nice deal. Just get 0.5 cm more length than your actual foot length.

comments.comment:
Decent pair of Nike running shoes, took around a week to break in properly, it felt at little tight initially but became flexible after a week or so. Good amount of spring once broken in. Really comfortable and fits well for my size. 
Been using these shoes for close to six months now, primarily for running and hikes, got a mileage of around 400km after which the fabric started tearing at the toes after this much usage, but delivers good on the promise of 300km mileage for the shoes as described in the original site. Happy with the purchase, got the most out of the shoes.

Nike sports shoes deliver exceptional comfort, style, and performance. The cushioning provides great support for long runs and workouts, while the sleek, modern design stands out. They offer excellent grip and flexibility, enhancing stability during fast movements. Despite extensive use, they remain in excellent condition, showcasing their durability and high-quality materials. Although Nike shoes are somewhat pricey, their comfort, durability, and performance make them a worthwhile investment. Ideal for running, HIIT, or casual walks, these shoes have exceeded my expectations and become a key part of my fitness gear. Highly recommended for anyone seeking top-notch sports shoes.

The Nike Solid Revolution 6 Next Nature road running shoe is a true game-changer for runners. With its innovative design and advanced technology, this shoe offers unmatched comfort, support, and performance. The next nature materials used in its construction provide a natural feel while running, enhancing your overall experience. The solid Revolution 6 also boasts excellent durability, ensuring it can withstand the rigors of long-distance running. Whether you're a seasoned marathoner or a casual jogger, this shoe is sure to elevate your running game to the next level.

Shoes came in good condition and delivery was Fast within 3-4 days . packaging and shoes box completely good condition and the shoes was comfortable,fit & genuine product of nike .I bought  size 9.5,I was check shoes barcode and shoes sole they are completely good & genuine .but this shoe maybe someone open because shoes are not to much clean .so please take care Myntra. And l  loved this product .

I usually use Adidas, Reebok, Puma & Saucony shoes through shuffling. This is the first time I thought to give Nike a shot. So started with basic shoes. Got it at a very good deal under 1.5k. The fit & finish is top notch. The midsole felt quite good & bouncy, whereas the insole felt a bit harder & less plush than Puma Softfoam+ & Run, Adidas Ortholite insoles. Breathability is good. But the main issue is the toebox is a bit on the narrower side. Perhaps it should've been a bit more wide to accommodate the feet better.
Anyway, let's see how it performs over time.

product_desc: Special Technologies:Simple Design: Plush mesh is placed at the forefoot and along the collar for a comfortable feel. Additional skins throughout add durability.More Flexibility: A foam midsole delivers a softer ride than the Revolution 5. The outsole has a computer-generated design that creates a natural piston effect as you run, providing more cushioning and flexibility. They combine for durable traction.Intuitive Touch: Touch points at the heel and tongue create a natural feel as you get the shoes on and off.Product Design Details:A pair of white road running shoes, has regular styling, lace-ups detailMesh upperCushioned footbedTextured & patterned rubber outsole100% recycled polyester laces.Warranty: 6 monthsWarranty to be provided by the brand /manufacturerAbout The Product:Here's to new beginnings between you and the pavement. Lace up the 100% recycled laces and set the pace at the start of your running journey with the plush feel of the Nike Revolution 6 Next Nature. We know comfort is key to a successful run, so we made sure your steps are cushioned and flexible for a soft ride. It's an evolution of a favorite, with a breathable design made with at least 20% recycled content by weight.
pd_material: Upper material: MeshWipe with a clean, dry cloth to remove the dust
pdp_name: Men Solid Revolution 6 Next Nature Road Running Shoes

comments.comment: The HRX by Hrithik Roshan Men White and Blue Running Shoes with Memory Foam Technology, in size 10, stand out for their exceptional comfort and stylish design. The combination of white and blue gives these shoes a fresh and contemporary look that pairs well with both athletic and casual outfits. The memory foam insoles adapt to your foot shape, providing personalized cushioning that enhances comfort during long runs or workouts. The shoes are lightweight, yet sturdy, offering good support and stability. The breathable mesh upper ensures proper ventilation, keeping your feet cool and dry. However, the sizing might run slightly small, so considering a half size up could be beneficial. Overall, these running shoes are a great investment for anyone seeking both style and performance in their athletic footwear.

I recently purchased a pair of HRX shoes, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. These shoes are not only stylish but incredibly comfortable as well. The design is versatile, allowing me to wear them for various occasions. The fit is perfect, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the craftsmanship. The quality of materials used is evident, and these shoes have proven to be durable. Whether I'm walking around the city or dressing up for a special event, these shoes have become my go-to choice. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a combination of style, comfort, and quality in their footwear.

The product is a pair of running shoes designed with comfort and performance in mind. They feature a memory foam cushioned footbed, providing exceptional comfort and support during workouts or runs. The shoes come in a clean, white color, adding a sleek and versatile touch to any sportswear ensemble. With a mesh upper, they offer breathability, keeping your feet cool and dry even during intense activities. The combination of memory foam and mesh construction ensures a comfortable and snug fit, making them ideal for both casual workouts and intense training sessions. Overall, these running shoes are a perfect blend of style, comfort, and functionality, promising a comfortable and enjoyable running experience.

HRX brand shoes redefine comfort and style, offering the perfect blend of functionality and fashion. Engineered with cutting-edge technology and premium materials, each pair ensures optimal support and durability, whether you're hitting the gym or exploring the outdoors. From running errands to running marathons, HRX shoes keep you stepping with confidence and ease. The sleek design and attention to detail make them a standout addition to any outfit, effortlessly transitioning from day to night. With HRX shoes, you not only elevate your footwear game but also prioritize your comfort and performance. Step into the future of footwear with HRX.

comments.comment: HRX brand shoes redefine comfort and style, offering the perfect blend of functionality and fashion. Engineered with cutting-edge technology and premium materials, each pair ensures optimal support and durability, whether you're hitting the gym or exploring the outdoors. From running errands to running marathons, HRX shoes keep you stepping with confidence and ease. The sleek design and attention to detail make them a standout addition to any outfit, effortlessly transitioning from day to night. With HRX shoes, you not only elevate your footwear game but also prioritize your comfort and performance. Step into the future of footwear with HRX.

Very Nice & Comfortable Product 👌 👍 
I recently purchased a pair of HRX shoes, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. These shoes are not only stylish but incredibly comfortable as well. The design is versatile, allowing me to wear them for various occasions. The fit is perfect, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the craftsmanship. The quality of materials used is evident, and these shoes have proven to be durable. Whether I'm walking around the city or dressing up for a special event, these shoes have become my go-to choice. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a combination of style, comfort, and quality in their footwear.

Great shoe with memory cuison helpful for sensitive foot, well suited for black lovers. Well build for those who uses it daily. Looks bulky but it's really very lite weight
But should have improved a bit in designing part. Due to design I'm reducing one star. But really you guys can go ahead and purchase it...

Nice product guysss
Product ekadam sahi hai shoes ekadam sahi hai SOL vagaira aapko jaisa chahie vaisa ekadam naya na bi se crack hoga aur Jaise aapko kahin बार-बार jana hai uske liye bhi ekadam sahi hai bhai ekadam Sahi sports vagaira kuchh aise gym running har chij ke liye kam a jaega aapko shaadi mein jana hai function hai koi etc etc nice product with my opinion 🫶🫶🫶♥️♥️

I recently purchased a pair of this sports shoes from HRX, and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed. Not only do they look stylish with their sleek design and black color, but they also provide excellent comfort. Whether I'm hitting the gym or going for a run, these shoes offer the support and cushioning I need to stay comfortable throughout my workout.

The materials used seem to be of high quality, and I can tell they're built to last. The durability of these shoes gives me confidence that they'll withstand regular use without showing signs of wear and tear anytime soon.

Overall, I'm very satisfied with my purchase. HRX has once again delivered a product that exceeds expectations in both style and performance. If you're in the market for a reliable pair of sports shoes that not only look great but also feel great on your feet, I highly recommend giving these a try

The HRX by Hrithik Roshan Men White and Blue Running Shoes with Memory Foam Technology, in size 10, stand out for their exceptional comfort and stylish design. The combination of white and blue gives these shoes a fresh and contemporary look that pairs well with both athletic and casual outfits. The memory foam insoles adapt to your foot shape, providing personalized cushioning that enhances comfort during long runs or workouts. The shoes are lightweight, yet sturdy, offering good support and stability. The breathable mesh upper ensures proper ventilation, keeping your feet cool and dry. However, the sizing might run slightly small, so considering a half size up could be beneficial. Overall, these running shoes are a great investment for anyone seeking both style and performance in their athletic footwear.

I recently purchased a pair of HRX shoes, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. These shoes are not only stylish but incredibly comfortable as well. The design is versatile, allowing me to wear them for various occasions. The fit is perfect, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the craftsmanship. The quality of materials used is evident, and these shoes have proven to be durable. Whether I'm walking around the city or dressing up for a special event, these shoes have become my go-to choice. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a combination of style, comfort, and quality in their footwear.

The product is a pair of running shoes designed with comfort and performance in mind. They feature a memory foam cushioned footbed, providing exceptional comfort and support during workouts or runs. The shoes come in a clean, white color, adding a sleek and versatile touch to any sportswear ensemble. With a mesh upper, they offer breathability, keeping your feet cool and dry even during intense activities. The combination of memory foam and mesh construction ensures a comfortable and snug fit, making them ideal for both casual workouts and intense training sessions. Overall, these running shoes are a perfect blend of style, comfort, and functionality, promising a comfortable and enjoyable running experience.

comments.comment: I am thoroughly impressed with their quality and style. Firstly, I was amazed by the quick delivery – the shoes arrived at my doorstep in just three days, which is fantastic service.The shoes are exceptionally comfortable, with a cushioned insole that provides excellent support for all-day wear. The design is classic yet modern, making them versatile enough to pair with both casual and semi-formal outfits.The craftsmanship is top-notch, with sturdy stitching and high-quality materials that speak to the durability of the shoes. I've worn them daily for the past few weeks, and they've held up remarkably well without any signs of wear and tear. The fit is true to size, and the shoes required no breaking in, which is a huge plus.Additionally, I received numerous compliments on the sleek look of these shoes. The U.S. Polo Assn. logo adds a touch of sophistication without being too flashy. The shoes also provide good traction, making them suitable for various surfaces.

Comfort: These shoes are incredibly comfortable. They have excellent padding and support, making them ideal for all-day wear. Whether I’m walking, standing, or running errands, my feet feel great.

The design is stylish and versatile. The classic U.S. Polo Assn. look is both fashionable and timeless, making them suitable for various occasions, from casual outings to more formal settings.

The quality of these shoes is top-notch. They are made with durable materials that can withstand regular use. Despite wearing them frequently, they still look and feel like new.

I liked the price and design of the shoe. Quality was ok for the price. I am not sure if the sole will be always sticked to the shoe. But it's not bad. But still it looks stylish and i feel good
